# .github Directory

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files and templates for the StackStruct repository.

## Contents

### Issue Templates
- **bug_report.md**: Template for reporting bugs
- **feature_request.md**: Template for requesting new features

### Pull Request Template
- **PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md**: Template for submitting pull requests

## Purpose

These templates help maintain consistency in:
- Bug reports
- Feature requests  
- Pull request submissions
- Community contributions

They ensure that all necessary information is provided when community members interact with the project.

## Customization

Feel free to modify these templates to better suit your project's needs. The templates are written in Markdown and use GitHub's issue template syntax.

## Additional Files

You can add more GitHub-specific files here:
- Workflow files (`.github/workflows/`)
- Funding information (`.github/FUNDING.yml`)
- Code owners (`.github/CODEOWNERS`)
- Issue config (`.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml`)

For more information about GitHub community health files, visit:
https://docs.github.com/en/communities/setting-up-your-project-for-healthy-contributions
